Trigger.Name: Macro #1 complete - Move to Macro #2
Trigger.Description: This should be the keypress to activate your 2nd crafting macro.

Trigger.Name: Restart macro after "You synthesize"
Trigger.Description: This should be the sequence of keypresses to confirm your recipe, and to activate your 1st crafting macro.

Trigger.Name: Dualcasted or Swiftcasted Spells
Trigger.Description: Doesn't reset combo because I think dualcast and comboing situations are 100% mutually exclusive

Trigger.Name: RDM OGCDs (fired from other triggers, keep disabled)
Trigger.Description:
Keep disabled to prevent it from accidentally firing
Call with conditions enabled - need this so that the triggers here check their own conditions

Trigger.Name: Combos and other instant GCDs
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

Trigger.Name: Reset combo: Casting
Trigger.Description:
Resets combo button when player starts casting a spell
Plugin log line triggers this much slower than chat log for some reason

Trigger.Name: Sword Oath (loses)
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<sourceName>[A-Za-z']{1,15} [A-Z][a-z']{1,14}) loses the effect of Sword Oath

Trigger.Name: Fight or Flight (loses)
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}1E:(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<sourceName>[A-Za-z']{1,15} [A-Z][a-z']{1,14}) loses the effect of Fight Or Flight

Trigger.Name: Actions
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>1[56]):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<sourceName>[a-zA-Z' ]{1,21}):(?<actionID>[\dA-F]{2,8}):(?<actionName>Fast Blade|Riot Blade|Total Eclipse|Shield Bash|Shield Lob|Rage Of Halone|Prominence|Goring Blade|Clemency|Royal Authority|Holy Spirit|Holy Circle|Confiteor|Atonement):(?<targetID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<comboCheck>([^:]*:){0,8}1?1B:)?
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

Action.Description: This is the catch-all - regex match without meeting any conditions defined below will just fire F1
This is the catch-all - regex match without meeting any conditions defined below will just fire F1

Trigger.Name: MCH combo
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>1[56]):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<sourceName>[a-zA-Z' ]{1,21}):(?<actionID>[\dA-F]{2,8}):(?<actionName>Split Shot|Slug Shot|Spread Shot|Clean Shot|Heated Split Shot|Heated Slug Shot|Heated Clean Shot):(?<targetID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<comboCheck>([^:]*:)*?1?1B:)
Trigger.Description: Regex technically doesn't match certain lines, but they are lines that don't matter in a practical sense... probably.

Trigger.Name: Perfect Balance (gains)
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>1A):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<targetName>.+?) gains the effect of Perfect Balance

Trigger.Name: Perfect Balance (loses)
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>1E):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<targetName>.+?) loses the effect of Perfect Balance

Trigger.Name: 1A:Player gains the effect of ___ from ___ for ___ Seconds.
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>1A):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<targetName>.+?) gains the effect of (?<statusName>.+?) from (?<sourceName>.+?) for (?<statusSeconds>[0-9]+\.00) Seconds\.
